title: Converging to the Chase - A Tool for Finite Controllability.
abstract: We solve a problem, stated in [CGP10], showing that Sticky Datalog exists, defined in the cited paper as an element of the Datalog pm project, has the finite controllability property. In order to do that, we develop a technique, which we believe can have further applications, of approximating Chase(D, cal T), for a database instance D and a set of tuple generating dependencies and data log rules cal T, by an infinite sequence of finite structures, all of them being models of cal T and D.
